General.Name: SIM Acquisition Corp. I Class A Ordinary Shares
General.Description: SIM Acquisition Corp. I does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the healthcare sectors. The company was incorporated in 2024 and is based in Miami, Florida. Sim Acquisition Corp. I is a subsidiary of SIM Sponsor 1 LLC.
General.Address: 78 SW 7th Street, Miami, FL, United States, 33130
